title: Midzɔ nu na Orbital Gbedoxɔ
heading: Kpe Wò Nudzɔdzɔa Nu
chooseHow: Tia alesi nàdi be yeawu yeƒe nudzɔdzɔ si dzi woɖea adzɔ le la nu:

option1.heading: Tiatia 1: Na Nudzɔdzɔ le Internet Dzi Fifia
option1.description: Kpe wò nudzɔdzɔa ɖo enumake to gaxɔgbalẽvi, gaxɔgbalẽvi, alo fexexemɔnu bubu siwo le Internet dzi zazã me to míaƒe ganyawo ŋuti gaxɔla si le dedie, si nye The Field , dzi. Àxɔ adzɔxegbalẽvi enumake.
option1.button: Na nudzɔdzɔ to The Field → dzi

option2.heading: Tiatia 2: Gadzraɖoƒe ƒe Gadede The Roy Foundation
option2.description: De ga le gadzraɖoƒe tẽ alo tsɔ ga ɖo ɖe The Roy Foundation , míaƒe hadɔwɔla vevitɔ kple ganyawo ƒe gaxɔla. Tiatia sia sɔ nyuie na nudzɔdzɔ gãwo alo dukɔwo dome gaɖoɖoɖa.
option2.instructions: Taflatse tsɔ " Orbital Temple - {donationType} " de nufiame ƒe akpaa dzi. Ne èwu wò asitɔtrɔ nu vɔ la, ŋlɔ lɛta na mí le sathi.roy@orbitaltemple.art kple wò asitɔtrɔ ŋuti nyatakakawo be nàxɔ wò adzɔxegbalẽvi.
option2.button: Ka Ðe Mía Dzi Ku Ðe Deposit Ŋu →

taxInfo.heading: Nunana si Woɖena Le Adzɔxexe Me
taxInfo.description: Orbital Temple nye dɔ si The Field (Performance Zone Inc.) , si nye 501(c)(3) habɔbɔ si mekpɔa viɖe aɖeke tso eme o, ƒe gakpekpeɖeŋu. Woate ŋu aɖe adzɔ le United States ƒe nudzɔdzɔwo katã dzi vaseɖe afisi se ɖe mɔ ɖo.
taxInfo.questions: Nyabiasewoe? Te ɖe mía ŋu le gabriela.veiga@orbitaltemple.art
